thread.title: SunEdison, Goldman Sachs funds form $1 bln investment vehicle
thread.title_full: SunEdison, Goldman Sachs funds form $1 bln investment vehicle | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: SunEdison, Goldman Sachs funds form $1 bln investment vehicle
text:
Aug 17 U.S. solar company SunEdison Inc said it would form a $1 billion warehouse investment vehicle, WSIP Warehouse, along with funds managed by Goldman Sachs Group Inc.
The investment vehicle will focus on funding construction costs and acquiring operating assets, SunEdison said on Monday. (Reporting by Anet Josline Pinto in Bengaluru)
